channel.title: Court Wizard Rework [orangeandblack5 Edition] - Level 1
channel.description:
I will be throwing out a few suggestions, but this first one is something I had implemented in my "Some Ideas" megathread a month or so ago, and it is also in the class cards for SFoL18. I believe that the Court Wizard is already a strong role with a solid set of uses and a high skill ceiling, so my first suggestion keeps it relatively the same as it already is.
---
>## [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] >**[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **Empower Spell (Day)** - Your night abilities will be stronger tonight. *(2 uses)* **Magical Barrier (Night)** - Protect a player from negative effects and conversion tonight. Does not prevent attacks. If empowered, prevents all others from visiting your target's room. *(Infinite uses)* **Tornado (Night)** - Swap two players' positions, causing all players targeting one of them to target the other. If empowered, bypasses redirection immunity. *(3 uses)* _Defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
>**Converts into [color=purple]The Sage[/color].**
------
>## [color=purple]The Sage[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Dark Rune (Day)** - If your target uses a day ability today, they will target themself *(1 use)* **Shock (Day)** - If your target uses a night ability tonight, they will target themself - *(1 use)* **Tornado (Night)** - Swap two players' positions, causing all players targeting one of them to target the other. *(Infinite uses)* **Wall of Fire (Night)** - Prevent all visits except that of The Assassin from affecting your target. *(2 Uses)* _Your objective is to Eliminate the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who stand against you_
------
Astute readers may notice that my added day ability is similar in origin to [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/court-wizard-rework-to-help-the-flood/54630]RawkHawk's[/url], and I would also be more than happy to see his implemented in lieu of this if we're sticking to minor changes. We have very similar views on the Court Wizard's current place in the game, and although I prefer the high skill ceiling of Tornado to his Magical Doorway I can definitely see where he is coming from. Deflections definitely have less potential to screw with your team than swaps, and I can see how that will be an appealing change to the masses of more casual Throne of Lies players. Given that, the best result may come from mashing together our two ideas, leading to the following:
---
>## [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] >**[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **Empower Spell (Day)** - Your night abilities will be stronger tonight. *(2 uses)* **Magical Barrier (Night)** - Protect a player from negative effects and conversion tonight. Does not prevent attacks. If empowered, prevents all others from visiting your target's room. *(Infinite uses)* **Tornado (Night)** - All visits to a single target will be redirected to another target of choice. Can’t target self or King. If empowered, bypasses redirection immunity. *(2 uses)* _Defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
>**Converts into [color=purple]The Sage[/color].**
------
>## [color=purple]The Sage[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Dark Rune (Day)** - If your target uses a day ability today, they will target themself *(1 use)* **Shock (Day)** - If your target uses a night ability tonight, they will target themself - *(1 use)* **Tornado (Night)** - All visits to a single target will be redirected to another target of choice. Can’t target self or King. *(Infinite uses)* **Wall of Fire (Night)** - Prevent all visits except that of The Assassin from affecting your target. *(2 Uses)* _Your objective is to Eliminate the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who stand against you_
------

item.title: Court Wizard Rework [orangeandblack5 Edition] - Level 1
item.dc:creator: RawkHawk
item.description:
Maybe I am missing the application of dark rune, but it seems like it will only be useful very rarely. Most bd don’t have day abilities. Sheriff having scout target him is useless since no one will be converted anyway. Noble will vote for himself which could have fringe late game utility. Butler could poison himself. Mystic would be unaffected, physician would be self targeted. It would be humorous for the prince to jail himself, though.

I feel your first suggesting doesn’t change enough about court wizard, however I personally agree cw doesn’t really need a change, but I think this extends more towards it might be more interesting to build a new support bd that we can properly base around the swapping ability, and adjust like that. I don’t think conversion preventing and target swapping should be paired together.

Read full topic
